is a small but unexpectedly crowded town in
The town is predominantly inhabited by the Chinese and Malays.

Roads from many directions take travellers to the town. Entering Grand Saga Highway and drive along appx. 28km straight into the Semenyih town is one of the options. Or take the Seremban State Road and after bypassing
, and
, you'll arrive in the town.
You may travel to ostrich farm which located appx. 10km from Semenyih town towards Nirvana cemetery. Or visit the most popular Chinese temple at Broga which worshiping "God of Rock" (
). According to the local peoples saying that this God will bring you some Lottery Luck if you has faith with it.
At the morning, you can enjoy beautiful hill view when you excersice at the hill top in Broga. Just nice for city peoples enjoying uptown live.
You may buy a rabbit as your pet when you visit Rabbit Farm in Broga. At this farm, you and your kids may play around with the rabbits and later, pluck fruits from farm trees.

Plenty of good food you must try, at morning, travel to Semenyih old town and visiting curry mee stalls that just located next to Semenyih school's field or drive into Semenyih Chinese New Village to enjoy various chinese restaurant local cuisine. Afternoon, try some spicy pork soup namely as Siew Man Hot Soup which located at Semenyih main street. It just located behind the fruit stalls. Dinner time you can eat at Semenyih Sentral which has plenty of local Indian, Chinese, and Malays foods. Malik tauhu and cucuk udang (in front of the town public field, operated more then 30 years) is famous among local and those from neighbouring town.
Chill out the hot day by having green coconut drinks where can buy it any where of the Semenyih road side.
Currently no any hotels or motels available in Semenyih town, but you can accommodate at YL motel at Jalan Semenyih's Taman Jasmin which just 8km away from Semenyih town.
For emergency, please dial 999 for any rescue.
After visiting Semenyih, you can head to Silk Highway and follow the sign to places you wish to go.
